attributes.action: stop councils penalising disabled people for ASBO issues caused by others
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign my petition to stop councils from evicting disabled people who take a standing against ASBO issues over prolonged period of time.

Disabled people are being let down by councils and left to deal with ASBO issues by themselves with no support.

Help disabled peoples council be held accountable for failure towards disabled people

Stop councils turning a blind eye to suffering disabled people.
